column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////After giving this place a second chance
column2: I was much more pleased with my experience. The food and sangria were delicious
column3: so I decided it was worth another go. Not only was the waitstaff friendly and attentive
column4: the food was very good. The goat cheese and tomato sauce is definitely worth trying
column5: and the spicy potatoes were also amazing. A friend of mine got the Spanish omelet
column6: which was also very good. Definitely glad I gave this place another shot!
